original_title: Raider in Canada: Portrait of Sean Martin
overview: For the past seven years, cartoonist Sean Martin has brought to life the characters of 'Doc and Raider', two gay men in a committed relationship who deal with AIDS, homophobia and everyday life in the nineties. The documentary, using the framework of a Calgary gay rodeo that Sean Martin participates in each year, looks at the influences on Martin's work and the search for his own space within the gay community.
title: Raider in Canada: Portrait of Sean Martin
